text: <@U0PKMSYKG|j3ffyang> set the channel purpose: + Share business requirements

purpose: Raise business requirements. List problem and challenge that #BlockChain can solve. Leverage technical integration in view of business architecture.
text: <@U0PKMSYKG|j3ffyang> set the channel purpose: Raise business requirements. List problem and challenge that #BlockChain can solve. Leverage technical integration in view of business architecture.

Thanks j3ffyang!  Has anybody done any work to data we can share?  I am an exprienced enterprise architect; totally fascinated by this technology.  We (a small proto-consortia) of individuals looking to use #BlockChain and promote it in the insurance space.  I look forward to discussing this.

My team is developing a solution of leveraging OpenBlockChain (OBC) to 
1. Identify ownership of a digital asset, such as microMovie and music, when "Post"
2. Record "Ownership", "Share" and "Payment of ownership when transferred" into distributed ledger
3. Define exchange/ tx of shared ownership into SmartContract, then link to finalized payment (connect to real money thru payment gateway)

purpose: + Raise business requirements. List problem and challenge that #BlockChain can solve. Leverage technical integration in view of business architecture.

purpose: Raise business requirements. List problem and challenge that #BlockChain can solve. Leverage technical integration in view of business architecture.
text: <@U0PKMSYKG|j3ffyang> set the channel purpose: Raise business requirements. List problem and challenge that #BlockChain can solve. Leverage technical integration in view of business architecture.

I’m interested in interoperability, which means people come together and talk about data standards, so one system’s music/rental car/drug data/airplane ticket/real-estate parcel/bond/token, etc. can be used in other systems and they talk to each other. I’m afraid we’re building a siloed blockchain world that will have strong security but very little leverage. This is 90% business conversation and agreement and work, and 10% talk. This is what my last book was about: 
<http://www.amazon.com/Pull-Power-Semantic-Transform-Business-ebook/dp/B002YJK5KK/>

text: All transaction, not only in technology, but also in business and even human life, having "Trust Challenge", could be somehow handled by #BlockChain.
